items.title: When Is Chinese New Year 2026? It Begins With A ‘Ring Of Fire’ Solar Eclipse
items.description: Feb. 17’s new moon eclipses the sun and begins Lunar New Year, with Ramadan beginning the following day. Both are lunar festivals.
